attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With recent troubles we are going through we all need to stop and chill and relax please give us our sundays back. I know the different reasons why shops are open on sundays but most shops have online stores and most large supermarkets are open 24 hours during the week. We get excited when bank holidays come round and petition for more and yet we have a bank holiday (sunday) every week and choice to waste it and people are forced to work it.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
